Test Name: HYPOXIA-INDUCIBLE FACTOR ALPHA (EPAS1/HIF2A) Gene Exons 9 and 12 Sequencing
Purpose: To sequence exons 9 and 12 of the EPAS1/HIF2A gene in order to detect mutations and variations with accurate and reliable results.
Equipment: Microcentrifuge, Thermocycler (PCR machine), Gel electrophoresis apparatus, DNA sequencer
